thread.section_title: Pullman London St Pancras Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short stay
thread.title_full: Short stay - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David G
title: Short stay
text: The stand out for me in this short stay was the warm, attentive and fantastic service, right from check in to eating in the restaurant, breakfast and check out. Room was very comfortable and well equipped. Good location too for central London. The only issue I had was when my place was cleared from the breakfast table when I wasn't finished, which incidentally happened the last time I stayed. All in, great hotel and would definitely recommend.
